definition: to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
hi-fi system/stereo sound system/abbr. to 音響|音响[yin1 xiang3]

sentences.english: Finally, modification of the lathe assembly is discussed about.
sentences.chinese: 最后对筘座组合体的改进进行了探讨。

sentences.english: A dumb and a dumber will never make a good combination
sentences.chinese: 阿呆与阿瓜永远不会是一对好组合。

sentences.english: I refuse to even use the hyphenated term Chinese-American.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至拒绝使用“美籍华裔”这个组合词。

sentences.english: G. Kendall and S. Rollins, Advanced Project Portfolio Management and the PMO.
sentences.chinese: 高级项目组合管理和计划管理组织。

sentences.english: Ignorance and confidence can truly be a winning combination.
sentences.chinese: 无知和自信真的可以称为一个成功的组合。

sentences.english: The test paper generation is a constrained multi-object optimization problem.
sentences.chinese: 组卷问题是一个多约束多目标组合优化问题。

sentences.english: That's what portfolio managers are supposed to be doing all the time.
sentences.chinese: 也是投资组合经理们一直应该在做的事。

sentences.english: Study the calculational methods of combinatorial sprinkler uniformity based on the above-mentioned mapped model.
sentences.chinese: 研究了基于上述映射模型的喷灌组合均匀度计算方法。

sentences.english: Each new combination of cable and attachment configuration shall be cross sectioned using this procedure.
sentences.chinese: 每个新的组合电缆和附属装置都应该通过此程序横截。

sentences.english: Stationary anode, single focus, and bridge silicon rectification, The X-ray generator is an oil-immersed self-cooled unit.
sentences.chinese: 固定阳极，单焦点，桥式硅整流，油浸自冷组合式。

sentences.english: Three portfolio units-internally set and marked. Work based learning evidence.
sentences.chinese: 三个内部单位组合设置和标记。

sentences.english: So now is a good time to take stock of IT’s most hated power couple.
sentences.chinese: 因此现在是清查这对最被痛恨的组合的好时机。

sentences.english: The combination creates an integrated online access-control and security solution.
sentences.chinese: 这种组合方式创建了一种安全的网络访问控制方式。

sentences.english: You can also combine multiple transformation animations in the same element.
sentences.chinese: 还可以在同一个元素中组合多个转换动画。

sentences.english: The reasonable color combination can make your beautiful eyes more charming and attractive.
sentences.chinese: 合理的色彩组合，令双眼妩媚动人。

sentences.english: The carcass performance and meat qualities of different hybridized combination finishing pigs was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了不同杂交组合育肥猪胴体品质和肉质特性。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to bring out the best in each other (idiom)/to complement one another well
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
matching/fitting in with/compatible with/to correspond/to fit/to conform to/rapport/to coordinate with/to act in concert with/to cooperate/to become man and wife/to combine parts of machine
troop arrangement/battle formation/lineup (of a sports team etc)
to combine/combination/composite character (i.e. a synonym of 合體字|合体字[he2 ti3 zi4])/(of clothes) to be a good fit
plus/to put in/to add/to add on/to add into/in addition/on top of that
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
